scripts.build:copy: mkdir -p lib/node_modules/@ryyppy/rescript-promise/lib/js/src && cp node_modules/@ryyppy/rescript-promise/lib/js/src/*.bs.js lib/node_modules/@ryyppy/rescript-promise/lib/js/src/ && mkdir -p lib/node_modules/rescript-url/lib/js/src && cp node_modules/rescript-url/lib/js/src/*.bs.js lib/node_modules/rescript-url/lib/js/src/
scripts.build: npm run build:rs && npm run build:copy && mkdir -p lib/node_modules/rescript/lib/js && cp node_modules/rescript/lib/js/*.js lib/node_modules/rescript/lib/js
